headline.main: Jack Abramoff Hints at Untold Scandals

docs.snippet: The disgraced lobbyist, out of prison and on a book tour, tells a reform-minded crowd he won't divulge all he knows because he doesn't want to put anyone else behind bars....
docs.abstract: The disgraced lobbyist, out of prison and on a book tour, tells a reform-minded crowd he won't divulge all he knows because he doesn't want to put anyone else behind bars.
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON -- Jack Abramoff hinted Monday that he knows of still more skeletons that are buried on Capitol Hill, but he's not saying where.

headline.main: N.B.A. Suspends Timberwolves' Love and Lakers' Brown

docs.snippet: Kevin Love was suspended for two games after stomping the Rockets' Luis Scola. Mike Brown was suspended for one game and fined $25,000 for the way he protested a call against the Jazz....
docs.abstract: Kevin Love was suspended for two games after stomping the Rockets' Luis Scola. Mike Brown was suspended for one game and fined $25,000 for the way he protested a call against the Jazz.

headline.main: N.B.A. Suspends Timberwolves' Love and Lakers' Brown

docs.snippet: Kevin Love was suspended for two games after stomping the Rockets' Luis Scola. Mike Brown was suspended for one game and fined $25,000 for the way he protested a call against the Jazz....

docs.lead_paragraph: The N.B.A. league office was busy Monday with disciplinary issues, handing out a fine and suspensions to the Timberwolves star Kevin Love and Lakers Coach Mike Brown.

docs.snippet: The collective effort to identify the unusual cluster bombs found in several places last year in Libya has yet to reach an answer, or even a consensus on the likely origins of the mystery submunitions....

docs.lead_paragraph: The collective effort to identify the unusual cluster bombs found in several places last year in Libya has yet to reach an answer, or even a consensus on the likely origins of the mystery submunitions. Several readers have pitched in publicly here on this site, or on Twitter. Others have sent material and suggestions by e-mail. The comparative illustration, above, fits that second category.

headline.main: Chase Agrees to Settle Lawsuit on Overdraft Fees

docs.snippet: Chase has agreed to settle a lawsuit over the way it charges fees to customers who overspend their accounts....
docs.abstract: Chase has agreed to settle a lawsuit over the way it charges fees to customers who overspend their accounts.

headline.main: Chase Agrees to Settle Lawsuit on Overdraft Fees

docs.snippet: Chase has agreed to settle a lawsuit over the way it charges fees to customers who overspend their accounts....
docs.abstract: Chase has agreed to settle a lawsuit over the way it charges fees to customers who overspend their accounts.
docs.lead_paragraph: J.P. Morgan Chase has agreed to pay $110 million to settle a class-action suit challenging the way it charged debit card fees to customers who spent more than what was in their accounts.
